name: hisat2_extract_snps_haplotypes_VCF.py
usage:
hisat2_extract_snps_haplotypes_VCF.py [-h] [--reference-type REFERENCE_TYPE] [--inter-gap INTER_GAP]
                                           [--intra-gap INTRA_GAP] [--non-rs] [--genotype-vcf GENOTYPE_VCF]
                                           [--genotype-gene-list GENOTYPE_GENE_LIST] [--extra-files] [-v]
                                           [genome_file] [VCF_fnames] [base_fname]

positionalArguments.name: VCF_fnames
positionalArguments.description: A comma-seperated VCF files (plain text or gzipped file is accepted: GRCh38_dbSNP_no_SVs.vcf or GRCh38_dbSNP_no_SVs.vcf.gz

positionalArguments.name: base_fname
positionalArguments.description: base filename for SNPs and haplotypes

options.description: show this help message and exit
Reference type: gene, chromosome, and genome (default: genome)
Maximum distance for variants to be in the same haplotype (default: 30)
Break a haplotype into several haplotypes (default: 50)
Allow SNP IDs not beginning with rs
VCF file name for genotyping (default: empty)
A comma-separated list of genes to be genotyped (default: empty)
Output extra files such as _backbone.fa and .ref
also print some statistics to stderr
